title: Fattoush
description: Refreshing mixture of hand-picked vegetables, mouthwatering seasoning, fried bread and pomegranate.

title: Green Salad
description: Fresh zesty mixture of vegetables ready to please even the most picky customer.

title: Jarjeer Salad
description: Rocca salad with tomato, onion and pomegranate, seasoned with lemon, olive oil and pomegranate syrop.

title: Tabbouleh
description: Chopped parsley, spring onions, crashed wheat and tomato seasoned with our special tabboula sauce to indulge your taste buds.

title: Mansaf
description: Rice and arabic meat, almonds and savoury yougurt carefully prepared with oldest family recipes. Accompanied by jameed soup.
